message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $90 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $87.50. What do you think?
